00045 // DataRecordNeuron definition
00046 // for neurons that record their activity
00047 // contains a list of the spike times
00049 
00050 class DataRecordNeuron
00051         : public DataCommonNeuron
00052 {
00053     friend class DataRecordNeuronVisitor;
00054 
00055 // construction
00056 protected:
00057     explicit DataRecordNeuron(ConfigBase * const configurator);
00058     void apply_vis_impl(AbstractVisitor & vis);
00059 
00060 // update methods
00061 protected:
00062     void notify_firing_impl(const Time & time_to_spike);
00063 
00064 // members and accessors
00065 protected:
00066     inline const std::deque<Time> & spike_time_list_impl() const {
00067         return spike_time_list_;
00068     }
00069 
00070 private:
00071     std::deque<Time> spike_time_list_;
00072 };
00073 
00074 
00075 
00077 // DataRecordNeuronVisitor class definition
00079 
00080 class DataRecordNeuronVisitor
00081         : public AbstractVisitor
00082         , public Visitor<DataRecordNeuron>
00083 {
00084 public:
00085     DataRecordNeuronVisitor() : spike_time_list_pointer_(0) {}
00086     void reset() {
00087         spike_time_list_pointer_ = 0;
00088     }
00089     void visit(DataRecordNeuron & drn) {
00090         spike_time_list_pointer_ = & drn.spike_time_list_;
00091     }
00092     std::deque<Time> * const spike_time_list_pointer() const {
00093         return spike_time_list_pointer_;
00094     }
00095     const std::deque<Time> & spike_time_list() const {
00096         return *spike_time_list_pointer_;
00097     }
00098     void erase_past_spike_list(const std::deque<Time>::iterator & it);
00099 protected:
00100     std::deque<Time> * spike_time_list_pointer_;
00101 };
00102 
00103 
00104 
00106 // inline definitions
00108 
00110 // constructor
00111 inline DataRecordNeuron::DataRecordNeuron(ConfigBase * const configurator)
00112         : DataCommonNeuron(configurator)
00113 {
00114     if (! dynamic_cast<DataRecordNeuronConfig *>(configurator))
00115         throw ConfigError("DataRecordNeuron: void configurator");
00116 };
00117 
00119 // called when the neuron fires a spike (activation mechanism)
00120 inline void DataRecordNeuron::notify_firing_impl(const Time & time_to_spike)
00121 {
00122     // add the spike time to the list of spike times
00123     spike_time_list_.push_back(time_to_spike + SimEnv::sim_time());
00124     // notify the post synapses
00125     DataCommonNeuron::notify_firing_impl(time_to_spike);
00126 }
00127 
00129 // to access the list of spike times
00130 inline void DataRecordNeuron::apply_vis_impl(AbstractVisitor & vis)
00131 {
00132     // check the compatibilty of the visitor and call the method visit if suitable
00133     DataRecordNeuronVisitor * ptvis = dynamic_cast<DataRecordNeuronVisitor *>(& vis);
00134     if (ptvis)
00135         ptvis->visit(*this);
00136     else
00137         // if the visitor is not suitable, send it to the base class
00138         DataCommonNeuron::apply_vis_impl(vis);
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00143 // called to erase the past of the list of the spike times
00144 // it is an iterator to indicate the position corresponding to the end of the "past" in the list
00145 inline void DataRecordNeuronVisitor::erase_past_spike_list(const std::deque<Time>::iterator & it)
00146 {
00147     // we have to use it2 and not it straight due to the const specification in const_iterator
00148     std::deque<Time>::iterator it2 = spike_time_list_pointer_->begin();
00149     it2 += (Size)(it - spike_time_list_pointer_->begin());
00150     spike_time_list_pointer_->erase(spike_time_list_pointer_->begin(), it2);
00151 }
